alert.note: Alert for Brule; Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:54PM MDT until June 29 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Jerauld County in central South Dakota... Brule County in south central South Dakota... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 654 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fort Thompson to 7 miles east of Reliance to near Dude Ranch, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Chamberlain around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kimball. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
